amendment.description: To ban naked credit default swaps and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 38. Record Vote Number: 156.
Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 4072. (consideration: CR S3884, S3894) To ban naked credit default swaps and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 4072.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 38. Record Vote Number: 156.
